languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт понимающе кивает и протягивает вам руку.{/n} "Тогда я бы хотела вновь увидеть сияние твоего мира, {name}. Человеческие эмоции... иные. Словно далекие звезды. И столь же завораживающие".

{n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт понимающе кивает и протягивает вам руку.{/n} "Тогда я бы хотела вновь увидеть сияние твоего мира, {name}. Человеческие эмоции... иные. Словно далекие звезды. И столь же завораживающие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet nos knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And are just as mesmerizing."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特会意地点了点头，向你伸出了手。{/n}“我也很乐意再次见证你的世界的光芒，{name}。人类的情感……与我们大不相同。它就像遥不可及的星辰，但同样令人着迷。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特会意地点了点头，向你伸出了手。{/n}“我也很乐意再次见证你的世界的光芒，{name}。人类的情感……与我们大不相同。它就像遥不可及的星辰，但同样令人着迷。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet asiente con decisión y te tiende la mano.{/n} «En tal caso me encantaría volver a ver el resplandor de tu mundo, {name}. Las emociones humanas son... distintas. Como estrellas lejanas. E igual de fascinantes».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet asiente con decisión y te tiende la mano.{/n} «En tal caso me encantaría volver a ver el resplandor de tu mundo, {name}. Las emociones humanas son... distintas. Como estrellas lejanas. E igual de fascinantes».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hoche la tête d'un air entendu et vous tend la main.{/n} « J'aimerais admirer l'éclat de votre monde une fois encore, {name}. Les émotions humaines sont... différentes, comme des étoiles lointaines, et elles sont tout aussi fascinantes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hoche la tête d'un air entendu et vous tend la main.{/n} « J'aimerais admirer l'éclat de votre monde une fois encore, {name}. Les émotions humaines sont... différentes, comme des étoiles lointaines, et elles sont tout aussi fascinantes. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet nickt wissend und streckt dir ihre Hand entgegen.{/n} "Dann würde ich gerne noch einmal das Leuchten Eurer Welt sehen, {name}. Menschliche Emotionen sind ... anders. Wie entfernte Sterne. Und ebenso faszinierend."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet nickt wissend und streckt dir ihre Hand entgegen.{/n} "Dann würde ich gerne noch einmal das Leuchten Eurer Welt sehen, {name}. Menschliche Emotionen sind ... anders. Wie entfernte Sterne. Und ebenso faszinierend."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはすべてを悟ったようにうなずき、あなたへと手を差し伸べる。{/n}「もう一度お前の世界の輝きを見てみたいのだ、{name}。人間の感情は…まるで違う。遠い星のように。そして同じくらいに魅惑的だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはすべてを悟ったようにうなずき、あなたへと手を差し伸べる。{/n}「もう一度お前の世界の輝きを見てみたいのだ、{name}。人間の感情は…まるで違う。遠い星のように。そして同じくらいに魅惑的だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, . Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, anlayışla başını sallayıp elini sana doğru uzatıyor.{/n} "O zaman dünyanın ışığını bir kez daha görmek isterim {name}. İnsan duyguları... Çok farklı. Uzak yıldızlar gibi büyüleyiciler."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet nods knowingly and extends her hand to you.{/n} "Then I would love to see the glow of your world once again, {name}. Human emotions are... different. Like faraway stars. And they are just as mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet anlayışla başını sallayıp elini sana doğru uzatıyor.{/n} "O zaman dünyanın ışığını bir kez daha görmek isterim {name}. İnsan duyguları... Çok farklı. Uzak yıldızlar gibi büyüleyiciler."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
